getIndexedProductList.description: Get Stripe products from the TakeShape API Index

getMyProfile.description: Get the signed in user's profile from ShapeDB

getMySubscriptions.description: Get the signed in user's subscriptions from Stripe

getMyPayments.description: Get the signed-in user's payments from Stripe

getProfileList.description: Returns a list of profiles in natural order.

Stripe_listProducts.description: Returns a list of your products. The products are returned sorted by creation date, with the most recently created products appearing first.

Stripe_getProduct.description: Retrieves the details of an existing product. Supply the unique product ID from either a product creation request or the product list, and Stripe will return the corresponding product information.

getMyLoyaltyCard.description: Get a loyalty card from Voucherify

upsertMyProfile.description: Upsert the signed-in user's profile, updating ShapeDB and Stripe

upsertMyCustomer.description: Upsert the signed-in user's Stripe customer

deleteMySubscription.description: Delete the signed-in user's subscription in Stripe

createMyCheckoutSession.description: Create a Stripe checkout session for the signed-in user

input.description:
The profiles that you would like to remove from the list. 

Example:

{
  "emails":["george.washington@klaviyo.com","abraham.lincoln@klaviyo.com"],
  "phone_numbers":["+13239169023"],
  "push_tokens":["03df25c845d460bcdad7802d2vf6fc1dfde97283bf75cc993eb6dca835ea2e2r"]
}

session.description: The Stripe checkout session associated with this payment.
session.title: Stripe Checkout Session

shipment.description: The ShipEngine label associated with this payment.
shipment.title: ShipEngine Label

product.description: The Stripe product associated with this subscription.
product.title: Stripe Product

price.description: The Stripe price associated with this line item.
price.title: Stripe Price

price.description: The Stripe price associated with this line item.
price.title: Stripe Price

schema.description:
The profiles that you would like to remove from the list. 

Example:

{
  "emails":["george.washington@klaviyo.com","abraham.lincoln@klaviyo.com"],
  "phone_numbers":["+13239169023"],
  "push_tokens":["03df25c845d460bcdad7802d2vf6fc1dfde97283bf75cc993eb6dca835ea2e2r"]
}
The profiles that you would like to add to the list. Each object in the array must have an `email` or `phone_number`. You can also provide additional properties as key-value pairs.
